name: Self-care: A reminder for myself
description:
I have a tendency to dive into situations when I'm asked for help. Many times, I'll jump in and then delay or forego morning routines I have for myself, sometimes getting around to them much later in the day.

So, this is just a reminder to try to find that moment of clarity and awareness and be kind to yourself. Simple acts count too.

Controls: Use the arrow keys for navigation, advancing dialog, and interacting with sprites.

This is the first world I've created with Bitsy. Since it's my first effort, I tried to focus on a simple and linear experience.
